attributes.action: Sutton should have more leisure places for young people.
attributes.background: In the last five years Sutton has lost many leisure places for young people. Starting with the bowling alley and now the theatres in the local area young people are losing their leisure choices. This causes more youth crime and so I propose that by providing more places like this will reduce crime.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Planning and leisure facilities in your area are the responsibility of your local council. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
